data.text: Yesu akhuruweke umwaakoni milhoko chinchi cha attu chahonttwara.
Ntu mmoka o makutulha nkaawa wa Yesu, nkaakhoroma eeraka, “Thithi mwattunaka nnookilhamiha.”
Yesu nkookolha moono nkammara eeraka, “Kinothanana nlhameke etu.” Wo uhipicha nkaalhama makutulha awe.
Yesu nkaamwirelha “Nhinhimerie ntu riyoothe. Nansho nrweeke mweechoniheke wa attu opochera ishaani ni ukumiha isadaka thoko chinohimia aya malhehero a ashinna Musa uhimiechesha wiira nholhama.”
Yesu vaakelha awe iwani yo Ukapenaumu nholhelhi mmoka o weemelhelha manyaasikari ahowa ni unlhepelha
nkeera, “Thithi, karumiya aka ri vanlhilhini nreta hoririyacha iruttu nowereiya chinene.”
Yesu nkaamwirelha, “Kinoowa unlhamihani.”
Nansho yoyo ntu uyo nkaakhulha, “Thithi, mii akiphwanelhiye wiira inyu nkelhe unupani waka. Nansho nromolheke nlhove tu namitheko aka noolhama.

Ukhalhawaya, ni mii kirii ntu kinowehiya ni mamulaka a attu akina, kikhalhanaka ikuru wa anamitheko. Kamwiirelhaka mmoka, ‘Urweeke!’ Khurwaaka. Kamwiirelhaka nkina, ‘Nkaawa va,’ khuwaaka. Nkina, kamwirelhaka ‘Upangeke ilha!’ Khupangaka.”
Yesu eeweke chiicho, nkaashanga chinene nkaahimeria attu anttwara ayo, “Kinohimia wo ikekhiaye wiira, akinapatta umwoona ntu riyoothe mu Israeli ri ni nrima thoko yolha.
Paahi etu, kinouhimeriani wiira attu enchi anoowa ukhuma unosha nchuwa ni akina uneelha nchuwa, akhalhaka vakaraamuni vamoka ni Aburahimu, Naisaka, ni Nayakhobo urii Imwene yo wiirimu.
Nansho alhe yaathananiye ukhalha muyoyo Umwene uyo anookakhelhiya vathe wiipiphini, uri nunlhiho ni ukhura miino.”
Amalheke, Yesu nkaamwirelha nholhelhi a manyaasikari Nrumi uyo, “Nrweeke uwani, ni iyo ikhalhekeke thoko mwinre inyu wo uvara nrima.”
Yesu nkaaphiya uwani u Napeturo, wowo nkaaphwanya ahokohi aya Napeturo anari areta vanlhilhini, awereiyaka iruttu.
Yesu nkaavara moono, ureta nkawaalhama. Nkayeemelha, nkayaachokholha waaterekhelha.
Uchechilho, Yesu nkaawiheriya attu enchi aari ni mashoka o unanara. Ni uyo wo wulhumacha nlhove tu, nkoomolhacha mashoka ni waalhamiha areta onkhaye.
Aapanga chiicho utimiriha malhove yaahimie ni anamilhohi ashinna Isaya wiira, “Yoyo howia uhichooria wihu, nkaakusha mareta ihu.”
Yesu vonne awe nlhoko wa attu ananrukurenrie, nkeerelha owiittucha awe arwee ukhopelhelhe nttiya.
Owiittuchiha Malhehero amoka nkanrwelha eeraka, “Owiittuchiha, ni mii kinouttwarani uriwoothe unohalha inyu urwaa.”
Yesu nkaakhulha, “Anancheto ahanaa milhiwi chaya ni ashanuni o uchulhu ahanaa iphuuru urimu, nansho Mwaana a Ntu kharina nipuro no waathalhelha muru awe.”
Ntu owiittucha nkina munlhokoni mwawe nkaamwirelha Yesu, “Thithi, nkihiye thoko kirwee kaavithe athumwanaka.”
Nansho Yesu nkaamwirelha, “Nkittwareke mii, mwaahiyeke attu akhwilhe avitheke mitembo chaya.”
Yesu nkaawelha nkalhavani, owiittucha awe nkayanttwara.
Vahipincheru iphioo yo machiri nkayaawukelha munttiyani, maashi nkaakelha nkalhavani. Nansho Yesu aari narumpe ikhove.
Owiittucha awe nkayanrwelha, nkayammusha yiiraka, “Thithi, nnoopolhe, ninootitimira!”
Yesu nkaakhulha, “Mwaattiva o nrima mwankani, chani nnoovani?” Nkeemelha nkaachachera iphioo ni maashi, nttiya nkanaamaalha shiriri.
Attu nkayoomiya uwanoni yiiraka, “Phi ntu ani yolha? Ata iphioo ni nttiya chinomwiiwelhelha!”

Yesu ni owiittucha awe nkayaaphiya ukhopelhelhe nttiya no Ugalilaya wi iwani yo Uagadara, wowo attu elhi yaavariye ni mashoka o unanara nkayankumaana akhumachaka umahiyeni. Yayo attu ayo yaari o woopiha chinene, mena khaawo ntu aavira yeyo iphiro iyo.
Ni ayo nkayaachokholha unyakulhacha yeeraka, “Urinani ni hii, uwe Mwaana a Nlhuku? Chani uwilhe unitwarusha nihuku nihu nihinaya?”
Vakhiviru ni vavawo vaari vahuwiyaka miphingo cho ikulhuwe.
Mashoka o unanara ayo nkayanlhepelha Yesu wiira, “Mwanoomolhaka, nnihiyeke nakelheke mphingo wo ikulhuwe.”
Yesu nkeerelha, “Nrwaacheke etu.” Vavawo nkayaakhuma attu o mashoka alhe, nkayaakelha nkulhuweni. Miphingo chonkhaye cho kulhuwe nkachaakhuruwelha uhito, nkachaakelha mmaashini nkachaakhwacha.
Attu yaahuwa ikulhuwe ayo nkayaattawacha nkayaarwaa, wowo nkayaahimiacha mmamatani chittu chonkhaye chaakumelhenlhe, ni mwaha wa attu o mashoka elhi alhe.
Paahi attu onkhaye o yeyo iwani iyo yahokhuma ni unrwelha Yesu, yamwooneke nkayanlhepelha wiira athame mwiilhaponi mwaya mmo.
